description: This fresh seasonal salad recipe pairs juicy mango with tender crab and peppery rocket and radish, tossed in a zesty spicy dressing.
keywords: Crab dishes,Pescatarian,Orange,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Mango,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Mango Radish & Crab Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large mango, peeled, pitted, and diced
1 red chile, seeded, if desired, and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Make the dressing by mixing together all the ingredients in a bowl, then season well.
Arrange the mango, radishes on a serving plate and toss with 1 tablespoon of the dressing.
Sprinkle with the scallions, crabmeat, and herbs. Drizzle over the remaining dressing and serve immediately.
